dn33:1.1.2: ekam samayam bhagava mallesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim pancamattehi bhikkhusatehi yena pava nama mallanam nagaram tadavasari.
dn33:1.1.3: Tatra sudam bhagava pavayam viharati cundassa kammaraputtassa ambavane.
dn33:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena paveyyakanam mallanam ubbhatakam nama navam sandhagaram acirakaritam hoti anajjhavuttham samanena va brahmanena va kenaci va manussabhutena.
dn33:1.2.2: Assosum kho paveyyaka malla: “bhagava kira mallesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim pancamattehi bhikkhusatehi pavam anuppatto pavayam viharati cundassa kammaraputtassa ambavane”ti.
dn33:1.2.3: Atha kho paveyyaka malla yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho paveyyaka malla bhagavantam etadavocum:
dn33:1.2.4: “idha, bhante, paveyyakanam mallanam ubbhatakam nama navam sandhagaram acirakaritam hoti anajjhavuttham samanena va brahmanena va kenaci va manussabhutena.
dn33:1.2.5: Tanca kho, bhante, bhagava pathamam paribhunjatu, bhagavata pathamam paribhuttam paccha paveyyaka malla paribhunjissanti.
dn33:1.2.6: Tadassa paveyyakanam mallanam digharattam hitaya sukhaya”ti.
dn33:1.3.1: Atha kho paveyyaka malla bhagavato adhivasanam viditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena sandhagaram tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva sabbasantharim sandhagaram santharitva bhagavato asanani pannapetva udakamanikam patitthapetva telapadipam aropetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu;
dn33:1.3.3: Ekamantam thita kho te paveyyaka malla bhagavantam etadavocum:
dn33:1.3.4: “sabbasantharisanthatam, bhante, sandhagaram, bhagavato asanani pannattani, udakamaniko patitthapito, telapadipo aropito.
dn33:1.4.1: Atha kho bhagava nivasetva pattacivaramadaya saddhim bhikkhusanghena yena sandhagaram tenupasankami; upasankamitva pade pakkhaletva sandhagaram pavisitva majjhimam thambham nissaya puratthabhimukho nisidi.
dn33:1.4.2: Bhikkhusanghopi kho pade pakkhaletva sandhagaram pavisitva pacchimam bhittim nissaya puratthabhimukho nisidi bhagavantamyeva purakkhatva.
dn33:1.4.3: Paveyyakapi kho malla pade pakkhaletva sandhagaram pavisitva puratthimam bhittim nissaya pacchimabhimukha nisidimsu bhagavantamyeva purakkhatva.
dn33:1.4.4: Atha kho bhagava paveyyake malle bahudeva rattim dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva uyyojesi:
dn33:1.4.7: “Evam, bhante”ti kho paveyyaka malla bhagavato patissutva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkamimsu.
dn33:1.5.1: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkantesu paveyyakesu mallesu tunhibhutam tunhibhutam bhikkhusangham anuviloketva ayasmantam sariputtam amantesi:
dn33:1.5.6: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma sariputto bhagavato paccassosi.
dn33:1.5.7: Atha kho bhagava catuggunam sanghatim pannapetva dakkhinena passena sihaseyyam kappesi pade padam accadhaya, sato sampajano utthanasannam manasi karitva.
dn33:1.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena nigantho nataputto pavayam adhunakalankato hoti.
dn33:1.6.2: Tassa kalankiriyaya bhinna nigantha dvedhikajata bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti:
dn33:1.6.3: “na tvam imam dhammavinayam ajanasi, aham imam dhammavinayam ajanami, kim tvam imam dhammavinayam ajanissasi. Micchapatipanno tvamasi, ahamasmi sammapatipanno. Sahitam me, asahitam te. dn33:1.6.4: Vadhoyeva kho manne niganthesu nataputtiyesu vattati.
dn33:1.6.5: Yepi niganthassa nataputtassa savaka gihi odatavasana, tepi niganthesu nataputtiyesu nibbinnarupa virattarupa pativanarupa, yatha tam durakkhate dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyanike anupasamasamvattanike asammasambuddhappavedite bhinnathupe appatisarane.

dn33:3.1.150: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati appamanani suvannadubbannani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
dn33:3.1.152: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati nilani nilavannani nilanidassanani nilanibhasani.
dn33:3.1.153: Seyyathapi nama umapuppham nilam nilavannam nilanidassanam nilanibhasam, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham nilam nilavannam nilanidassanam nilanibhasam;
dn33:3.1.154: evameva ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati nilani nilavannani nilanidassanani nilanibhasani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
dn33:3.1.156: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati pitani pitavannani pitanidassanani pitanibhasani.
dn33:3.1.157: Seyyathapi nama kanikarapuppham pitam pitavannam pitanidassanam pitanibhasam, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham pitam pitavannam pitanidassanam pitanibhasam;
dn33:3.1.158: evameva ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati pitani pitavannani pitanidassanani pitanibhasani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
dn33:3.1.160: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati lohitakani lohitakavannani lohitakanidassanani lohitakanibhasani.
dn33:3.1.161: Seyyathapi nama bandhujivakapuppham lohitakam lohitakavannam lohitakanidassanam lohitakanibhasam, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham lohitakam lohitakavannam lohitakanidassanam lohitakanibhasam;
dn33:3.1.162: evameva ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati lohitakani lohitakavannani lohitakanidassanani lohitakanibhasani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
dn33:3.1.164: Ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati odatani odatavannani odatanidassanani odatanibhasani.
dn33:3.1.165: Seyyathapi nama osadhitaraka odata odatavanna odatanidassana odatanibhasa, seyyatha va pana tam vattham baranaseyyakam ubhatobhagavimattham odatam odatavannam odatanidassanam odatanibhasam;
dn33:3.1.166: evameva ajjhattam arupasanni eko bahiddha rupani passati odatani odatavannani odatanidassanani odatanibhasani, ‘tani abhibhuyya janami passami’ti evamsanni hoti.
dn33:3.1.175: Sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.1.177: Sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.1.179: Sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.1.181: Sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.1.183: Sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.1.185: Ime kho, avuso, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena attha dhamma sammadakkhata;
dn33:3.1.186: tattha sabbeheva sangayitabbam …pe… atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
dn33:3.2.1: Atthi kho, avuso, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena nava dhamma sammadakkhata;
dn33:3.2.2: tattha sabbeheva sangayitabbam …pe… atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
dn33:3.2.8: ‘piyassa me manapassa anattham acari’ti aghatam bandhati …pe…
dn33:3.2.11: ‘appiyassa me amanapassa attham acari’ti aghatam bandhati …pe…
dn33:3.2.15: ‘Anattham me acari, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
dn33:3.2.16: ‘anattham me carati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
dn33:3.2.17: ‘anattham me carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
dn33:3.2.20: anattham carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti;
dn33:3.2.23: attham carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti.
dn33:3.2.25: Santavuso, satta nanattakaya nanattasannino, seyyathapi manussa ekacce ca deva ekacce ca vinipatika.
dn33:3.2.27: Santavuso, satta nanattakaya ekattasannino, seyyathapi deva brahmakayika pathamabhinibbatta.
dn33:3.2.29: Santavuso, satta ekattakaya nanattasannino, seyyathapi deva abhassara.
dn33:3.2.31: Santavuso, satta ekattakaya ekattasannino, seyyathapi deva subhakinha.
dn33:3.2.33: Santavuso, satta asannino appatisamvedino, seyyathapi deva asannasatta.
dn33:3.2.35: Santavuso, satta sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanupaga.
dn33:3.2.37: Santavuso, satta sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanupaga.
dn33:3.2.39: Santavuso, satta sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanupaga.
dn33:3.2.41: Santavuso, satta sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanupaga.
dn33:3.2.44: Idhavuso, tathagato ca loke uppanno hoti araham sammasambuddho, dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbaniko sambodhagami sugatappavedito.
dn33:3.2.47: Puna caparam, avuso, tathagato ca loke uppanno hoti araham sammasambuddho, dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbaniko sambodhagami sugatappavedito.
dn33:3.2.60: paccantimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti milakkhesu avinnataresu, yattha natthi gati bhikkhunam bhikkhuninam upasakanam upasikanam.
dn33:3.2.63: majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti. So ca hoti micchaditthiko viparitadassano:
dn33:3.2.64: ‘natthi dinnam, natthi yittham, natthi hutam, natthi sukatadukkatanam kammanam phalam vipako, natthi ayam loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mata, natthi pita, natthi satta opapatika, natthi loke samanabrahmana sammaggata sammapatipanna ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
dn33:3.2.67: majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti. So ca hoti duppanno jalo elamugo, nappatibalo subhasitadubbhasitanamatthamannatum.
dn33:3.2.69: Puna caparam, avuso, tathagato ca loke na uppanno hoti araham sammasambuddho,
dn33:3.2.70: dhammo ca na desiyati opasamiko parinibbaniko sambodhagami sugatappavedito. Ayanca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccajato hoti, so ca hoti pannava ajalo anelamugo, patibalo subhasitadubbhasitanamatthamannatum.
dn33:3.2.73: Idhavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.2.74: Vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.2.75: Pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.2.76: Sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.2.77: Sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama …pe… akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.2.78: Sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.2.79: Sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.2.80: Sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.2.81: Sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.2.83: Pathamam jhanam samapannassa kamasanna niruddha hoti.
dn33:3.2.84: Dutiyam jhanam samapannassa vitakkavicara niruddha honti.
dn33:3.2.85: Tatiyam jhanam samapannassa piti niruddha hoti.
dn33:3.2.86: Catuttham jhanam samapannassa assasapassassa niruddha honti.
dn33:3.2.91: Sannavedayitanirodham samapannassa sanna ca vedana ca niruddha honti.
dn33:3.2.92: Ime kho, avuso, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena nava dhamma sammadakkhata.
dn33:3.2.93: Tattha sabbeheva sangayitabbam …pe… atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
dn33:3.3.1: Atthi kho, avuso, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena dasa dhamma sammadakkhata.
dn33:3.3.2: Tattha sabbeheva sangayitabbam …pe… atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
dn33:3.3.5: Idhavuso, bhikkhu silava hoti. Patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno, anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
dn33:3.3.6: Yampavuso, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati, acaragocarasampanno, anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
dn33:3.3.8: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. Ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattha sabyanjana kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
dn33:3.3.9: Yampavuso, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti …pe… ditthiya suppatividdha.
dn33:3.3.11: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu kalyanamitto hoti kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko.
dn33:3.3.12: Yampavuso, bhikkhu kalyanamitto hoti kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko.
dn33:3.3.14: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu suvaco hoti sovacassakaranehi dhammehi samannagato khamo padakkhinaggahi anusasanim.
dn33:3.3.15: Yampavuso, bhikkhu suvaco hoti …pe… padakkhinaggahi anusasanim.
dn33:3.3.17: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu yani tani sabrahmacarinam uccavacani kinkaraniyani, tattha dakkho hoti analaso tatrupayaya vimamsaya samannagato, alam katum alam samvidhatum.
dn33:3.3.18: Yampavuso, bhikkhu yani tani sabrahmacarinam …pe… alam samvidhatum.
dn33:3.3.20: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu dhammakamo hoti piyasamudaharo, abhidhamme abhivinaye ularapamojjo.
dn33:3.3.23: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu santuttho hoti itaritarehi civarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharehi.
dn33:3.3.26: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
dn33:3.3.27: Yampavuso, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati …pe… anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
dn33:3.3.29: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu satima hoti paramena satinepakkena samannagato cirakatampi cirabhasitampi sarita anussarita.
dn33:3.3.30: Yampavuso, bhikkhu satima hoti …pe… sarita anussarita.
dn33:3.3.32: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhu pannava hoti, udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya sammadukkhakkhayagaminiya.
dn33:3.3.36: Pathavikasinameko sanjanati, uddham adho tiriyam advayam appamanam.
dn33:3.3.45: vinnanakasinameko sanjanati, uddham adho tiriyam advayam appamanam.
dn33:3.3.47: panatipato, adinnadanam, kamesumicchacaro, musavado, pisuna vaca, pharusa vaca, samphappalapo, abhijjha, byapado, micchaditthi.
dn33:3.3.49: panatipata veramani, adinnadana veramani, kamesumicchacara veramani, musavada veramani, pisunaya vacaya veramani, pharusaya vacaya veramani, samphappalapa veramani, anabhijjha, abyapado, sammaditthi.
dn33:3.3.51: Idhavuso, bhikkhu pancangavippahino hoti, chalangasamannagato, ekarakkho, caturapasseno, panunnapaccekasacco, samavayasatthesano, anavilasankappo, passaddhakayasankharo, suvimuttacitto, suvimuttapanno.
dn33:3.3.53: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno kamacchando pahino hoti, byapado pahino hoti, thinamiddham pahinam hoti, uddhaccakukkuccam pahinam hoti, vicikiccha pahina hoti.
dn33:3.3.54: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu pancangavippahino hoti.
dn33:3.3.56: Idhavuso, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
dn33:3.3.58: manasa dhammam vinnaya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajano.
dn33:3.3.59: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu chalangasamannagato hoti.
dn33:3.3.61: Idhavuso, bhikkhu satarakkhena cetasa samannagato hoti.
dn33:3.3.62: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu ekarakkho hoti.
dn33:3.3.64: Idhavuso, bhikkhu sankhayekam patisevati, sankhayekam adhivaseti, sankhayekam parivajjeti, sankhayekam vinodeti.
dn33:3.3.65: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu caturapasseno hoti.
dn33:3.3.67: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno yani tani puthusamanabrahmananam puthupaccekasaccani, sabbani tani nunnani honti panunnani cattani vantani muttani pahinani patinissatthani.
dn33:3.3.68: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu panunnapaccekasacco hoti.
dn33:3.3.70: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno kamesana pahina hoti, bhavesana pahina hoti, brahmacariyesana patippassaddha.
dn33:3.3.71: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu samavayasatthesano hoti.
dn33:3.3.73: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno kamasankappo pahino hoti, byapadasankappo pahino hoti, vihimsasankappo pahino hoti.
dn33:3.3.74: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu anavilasankappo hoti.
dn33:3.3.76: Idhavuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
dn33:3.3.77: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu passaddhakayasankharo hoti.
dn33:3.3.79: Idhavuso, bhikkhuno raga cittam vimuttam hoti, dosa cittam vimuttam hoti, moha cittam vimuttam hoti.
dn33:3.3.80: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu suvimuttacitto hoti.
dn33:3.3.82: Idhavuso, bhikkhu ‘rago me pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo’ti pajanati.
dn33:3.3.83: ‘Doso me pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo’ti pajanati.
dn33:3.3.84: ‘Moho me pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo’ti pajanati.
dn33:3.3.85: Evam kho, avuso, bhikkhu suvimuttapanno hoti.
dn33:3.3.87: asekkha sammaditthi, asekkho sammasankappo, asekkha sammavaca, asekkho sammakammanto, asekkho sammaajivo, asekkho sammavayamo, asekkha sammasati, asekkho sammasamadhi, asekkham sammananam, asekkha sammavimutti.
dn33:3.3.88: Ime kho, avuso, tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena dasa dhamma sammadakkhata.
dn33:3.3.89: Tattha sabbeheva sangayitabbam na vivaditabbam, yathayidam brahmacariyam addhaniyam assa ciratthitikam, tadassa bahujanahitaya bahujanasukhaya lokanukampaya atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanan”ti.
dn33:3.4.1: Atha kho bhagava utthahitva ayasmantam sariputtam amantesi:
dn33:3.4.3: sadhu kho tvam, sariputta, bhikkhunam sangitipariyayam abhasi”ti.
dn33:3.4.5: Attamana te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa bhasitam abhinandunti.
